check.help: Verify consistency between code and docs.

generate.help: Generate .pyi stubs based on pyproject.toml config.

init.help: Initialize Stitcher in the current project.

inject.help: Inject docstrings from .stitcher.yaml files back into code.

pump.help: Extract new docstrings from source code and merge them into .stitcher.yaml.

refactor_apply.help: Apply automated refactorings from a migration script.

not_implemented: ℹ️  Command '{command}' is not yet implemented.
